price: 31 Quant à Satan, il a refusé de les imiter.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
